properties.title: DavMail POP/IMAP/SMTP/Caldav Exchange Gateway - Thunderbird directory setup
properties.author: Mickael Guessant

section.name: Thunderbird directory setup
section.p: DavMail Directory support is now available to access Exchange address book through LDAP.

section.name: Create a new LDAP directory
section.p: Open Thunderbird address book and choose File/New/LDAP Directory:

Choose a name, host is always localhost, LDAP base context ou=people, adjust port to your settings and set user to your Active Directory account name, i.e. domain\account. Leave other options to default values.
You may also want to use this directory for mail completion in compoze window :
